snippet: The New York Police Department said Thursday that it would join the effort to identify past victims of abuse at the Horace Mann School by creating a confidential hot line for claims.
abstract: New York Police Department says it will join the effort to identify past victims of abuse at the Horace Mann School, creating a confidential hot line for claims.
lead_paragraph: The New York Police Department said Thursday that it would join the effort to identify past victims of abuse at the Horace Mann School by creating a confidential hot line for claims.

headline.seo: Police, Seeking Horace Mann Abuse Claims, Set Up Hot Line
headline.main: A Police Hot Line for Abuse Claims at Horace Mann
headline.print_headline: A Police Hot Line For Abuse Claims At Horace Mann
